content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Louisiana Recovery Authority</origin> <pubdate>20070501</pubdate> <title>Louisiana Speaks Regional Plan Vision New Growth Areas, UTM Zone 15N NAD83, Louisiana Recovery Authority (2007), [louisiana_speaks_vision_new_growth_areas]</title> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <onlink>http://lagic.lsu.edu/data/lra/louisiana_speaks_vision_new_growth_areas.zip</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract> This GIS shapefile data illustrates new growth areas included in the Louisiana Speaks Regional Plan Vision. New growth areas include a mix of industrial, single family homes, townhomes, multifamily housing, and local shops that are accessible by transit service and roads.  The Louisiana Speaks Regional Plan process study area includes the 35 southernmost parishes of Louisiana. </abstract> <purpose> The Louisiana Speaks Regional Plan Vision illustrates a future for South Louisiana based on the input of tens of thousands of citizens and stakeholders. It also includes elements of the Coastal Protection and Restoration Authority\ufffd\ufffds Master Plan, the Louisiana State Department of Transportation and Development (DOTD) Statewide Transportation Plan, and other state and regional agency plans.  The vision builds on a sustainable recovery that restores coastal wetlands, constructs strategic levees, and reinvests in historic communities. New growth is focused in and around existing communities, and linked to investments in protection infrastructure, regional transportation, and economic zones. </purpose> <supplinf>None.</supplinf> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20070501</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>publication date</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>None planned</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-93.615401</westbc> <eastbc>-89.730046</eastbc> <northbc>30.975574</northbc> <southbc>29.503179</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>none</themekt> <themekey>Louisiana Speaks</themekey> <themekey>Regional Plan</themekey> <themekey>Vision</themekey> <themekey>New growth</themekey> <themekey>Town Center</themekey> <themekey>Neighborhood</themekey> <themekey>Suburban</themekey> <themekey>Industrial</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>none</placekt> <placekey>Louisiana</placekey> <placekey>LA</placekey> <placekey>South Louisiana</placekey> <placekey>Louisiana Coast</placekey> <placekey>Gulf Coast</placekey> </place> <temporal> <tempkey>Post-Katrina</tempkey> <tempkey>Post-Rita</tempkey> <tempkey>2050</tempkey> </temporal> </keywords> <accconst>None.</accconst> <useconst> Acknowledgement of the Louisiana Speaks Regional Plan and Louisiana Recovery Authority would be appreciated in products developed from these data.
